title: Top Places to visit in Vellore, Tamil Nadu
content: Vellore is a city and the administrative headquarters of Vellore District in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. title: Top Places to visit in Tiruvannamalai, Tamil Nadu
content: Tiruvannamalai (also Thiruvannamalai or Trinomali and Trinomalee during British times) is a town in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. title: Top Places to visit in Tiruvarur, Tamil Nadu
content: Thiruvarur also spelled as Tiruvarur[a] is a town and municipality in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It is the administrative headquarters of Tiruvarur district and Tiruvarur taluk. title: Top Places to visit in Tiruvallur, Tamil Nadu
content: Tiruvallur district, also known as Thiruvallur District, is an administrative district in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. The fast developing city of Tiruvallur is the district headquarters. title: Top Places to visit in Tirupattur, Tamil Nadu
content: Tirupattur is a town and also the headquarter of Tirupattur district, India, one of the oldest places in Tamil Nadu. title: Top Places to visit in Thoothukudi, Tamil Nadu
content: Thoothukudi (also known as Tuticorin, the official name until 2018) is a port city and a municipal corporation and an industrial city in Thoothukudi district in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. title: Top Places to visit in Thanjavur, Tamil Nadu
content: Thanjavur, formerly Tanjore, is a city in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. Thanjavur is an important center of South Indian religion, art, and architecture. title: Top Places to visit in Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu
content: Tirunelveli, also known as Nellai and historically (during British rule) as Tinnevelly, is a major city in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It is the administrative headquarters of the Tirunelveli District. It is the sixth-largest municipal corporation in the state after Chennai, Coimbatore, Madur

title: Top Places to visit in Theni, Tamil Nadu
content: Theni is a hillock town situated in Madurai Region of Tamil Nadu. It is known for the large-scale trading of garlic, cotton, cardamom, grapes, mango and chilli. title: Top Places to visit in Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu
content: Tiruchirappalli[b] (formerly Trichinopoly in English), also called Trichy, is a major tier II city in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu and the administrative headquarters of Tiruchirappalli District. title: Top Places to visit in Tirupur, Tamil Nadu
content: Tiruppur or Tirupur is a city located in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. Tiruppur is the administrative headquarters of Tiruppur district and the fifth largest urban agglomeration in Tamil Nadu. title: Top Places to visit in Tenkasi, Tamil Nadu
content:
Tenkasi is a new district of Tamil Nadu, India, separated from Tirunelveli District. The Tamil Nadu government announced its creation on July 18, 2019, together with Chengalpattu district. The capital is in Tenkasi.
